verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
The heavens declare His glory
The earth, the work of His hands.
Man, the image of His glory,
Jesus Christ, the head of this man.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Jesus, the endless Spirit,
Reproducing Himself in all,
Destroying the old creation,
Of the twain making one new man.

verse.name: v3
